descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a barrel In Whiterun.
This barrel is the same as Atronachforge,so put ingredients into the barrel and activate pull chain,then you will get items.
Items you get are Random Leveled Potions,Random Scrolls,Random Leveled Staves and Random Leveled Spell Tome,so I believe this will not break game balance.
There are will be a book on the barrel,and Recipes are written in this book.

Used Ingredients.
- I mainly created this mod to create Vanilla Potions,so most of recipes are required Alchemy Ingredients,but All you need are Ingredients,not specific ingredients,so you can use ANY ingredients you want.(Human heart,Pearl and others,which will not be sold are not used.)

-Empty wine bottle.This is used many times in this mod,but I am not sure if i can get this item without exploring dungeons.And I felt it is hard to get,so you are able to craft Empty wine bottle from any Wines at Smelter.
author: francenal
